article_title: Primary election preview: Vandersand challenges Davis for U.S. House seat

article_metadata.description: U.S. Rep. Rodney Davis, R-Taylorville, seeking a third two-year term in Congress, says he’s had some successes, including passage of legislation to allow small businesses to hire more veterans.“In my 3 1/2 years in Congress, we’ve cut billions in wasteful spending, forced the president to address entitlements, which drive our nation’s debt, and passed major legislation like the farm bill, waterway reform bill, and the highway bill that included conservative reforms
article_metadata.author: Bernard Schoenburg
